name: Black Desert Online Forum Dark Mode
additional_info:
UPDATES

09/07/2018
- Spoilers are now darker and easier to read.

07/19/2018
- Made polls look nicer.

07/11/2018
- Changed background color of quick-reply avatar.
- Updated the background hover color of the drop-down menus (messages inbox & notifications).
- Removed underlines on links when hovered on.
- Fixed padding of sub-navigation and added hover styles.

06/26/2018
- Updated "Your Account" page to have dark mode.
